text: Kɨlop gɨñɨnɨgun agɨl wog anɨb ak gɨpɨm ak, binɨb okok kɨlop gek, gɨtep gɨpɨm anɨb ak kɨli mɨseŋ nɨgɨnɨgabal. Nɨŋɨd, anɨgɨl agɨnɨgabal, Klays takaw teplep ak nab nɨbi pi okok mɨdek, nɨbi nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨpɨm agɨnɨgabal. Pen tap kuŋay yɨbɨl kɨlop ñɨbɨm ak sek, tap kuŋay binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop ñɨbɨm ak sek, anɨb ak abe nɨŋɨd, God yɨb nop dad aplanɨgabal.
